backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing role-based access control and blob storage mixins, with user profile management and certificate upload/retrieval functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components including hero, professional sections, certifications gallery, and upload functionality with authentication.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the portfolio application with viewport meta tag and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the portfolio with ThemeProvider and Toaster, rendering all sections including hero, experience, certifications, and upload folder.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Full-screen modal component for viewing certificates with keyboard navigation (Escape, arrow keys), prev/next buttons, and image counter display.
frontend/src/components/CertificatesFold: Certificate upload and display component with Internet Identity authentication, file validation (10MB max, JPEG/PNG/PDF), progress tracking, and integration with backend queries.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Empty component file for certifications gallery (content truncated or removed).
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: Grid display of nine core technical competencies with icons including project management, AutoCAD, cybersecurity, data analytics, and networking.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Education timeline displaying four academic qualifications from MSc (in view) to SSCE with institutions and graduation years.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero banner with Jerry Osiobe's headshot, name, credentials (MNSE, COREN), and contact information (email, phone, location) over a gradient background with decorative overlays.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: Renders a grid of personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) with corresponding icons in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: Displays categorized professional certifications and memberships across six areas: Engineering Memberships, Project & Risk Management, Data & AI, Cybersecurity, Process Improvement, and Technical Courses.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Shows a timeline of six professional roles with company names, dates, and key responsibilities, including current position as Fabrication Engineer and past roles in cybersecurity, data analysis, and network support.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Presents a brief professional summary highlighting expertise in Materials & Metallurgical Engineering, Project Management, Cybersecurity, Data Analytics, and related technical skills.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists five research papers/publications with titles and DOI links covering topics like CCTV systems, business continuity, environmental impact assessment, and mathematical systems.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating it with the current Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient, with configurable options for identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching certificates, uploading certificates, and managing user profiles through the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme color palettes (using OKLCH color space), and base styles for typography and layout including a grid pattern utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color system, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and animation keyframes for accordion and other UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Ebruvwiyor Osiobe with sections for hero, summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience, publications, and interests in a single-page layout.
